name: Using the Docs
description: Learn where everything lives and how to get the most out of the docs.

steps.title: Using the Docs
steps.task: This tour shows you where everything lives — navigation, search, AI, and settings. Let's walk through it together.

steps.title: Search
steps.task: Find anything instantly. Search covers components, composables, guides—even deep API references.
steps.learn: Instantly locate any component or guide

steps.title: Navigation
steps.task: Your map to everything. Browse by category or expand sections to explore what's available.

steps.title: Table of Contents
steps.task: Jump to any section. Click a heading to skip straight there—no scrolling required.
steps.learn: Jump directly to any section on a page

steps.title: Breadcrumbs
steps.task: See where you are. Breadcrumbs show your path through the docs—click any segment to jump back.
steps.learn: Navigate back through the documentation hierarchy

steps.title: Page Actions
steps.task: Spot something wrong? Edit it on GitHub, report it, or grab the source—directly from any page.

steps.title: Page Metadata
steps.task: Know what you're getting into. Skill level, test coverage, and performance tier—at a glance.
steps.learn: Assess feature complexity before diving in

steps.title: Ask AI
steps.task: Stuck? Ask AI knows this page inside out. Ask anything and get an answer in seconds.
steps.learn: Get instant answers without leaving the page

steps.title: Ask AI Panel
steps.task: Your conversation lives here. Scroll back through history or pick up where you left off.

steps.title: Conversation Tools
steps.task: Save, copy, or start fresh. Your AI conversations can be exported to Vuetify Bin for later.

steps.title: Settings
steps.task: Make it yours. Toggle themes, adjust layout, and filter content to match how you work.
steps.learn: Customize the docs to your preferences

steps.title: Skill Levels
steps.task: Show what matters. Beginner sticks to fundamentals. Advanced unlocks everything.
steps.learn: Filter content to match your experience

steps.title: Tour Complete
steps.task: You've got the lay of the land. Go explore—or dive into another tour when you're ready.
steps.learn: Confidently navigate the entire docs site
